hanzi-su-wiki:
獄

Значения

Тюрьма, заключение; скандал

Мнемоника

Скандал, когда грызутся на словах 言 как собаки ( 犭 и 犬). В результате, кто-то попадает в тюрьму.

Варианты

狱

獄獄RS
狱狱		prison, jail, case, lawsuit
  • RS. the place where dogs 犭犬 yell 言 at each other: jail
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 狱)
Ideographic: A guard dog 犭 talking 言 to a prisoner 犬
purpleculture_tree:

      • 犬 [ quǎn ] dog
heisig_chinese_memo: The wild dog family visits their cousin in prison. They exchange words over the interphone at the visiting booth.
heisig_constituent: prison, pack of wild dogs, say, words, keitai, mouth, chihuahua, dog, large, drop
heisig_story: Although we did not make note of it at the time, the kanji for dog is also a low-grade term for a spy. And later (Frame 1517) we will meet another association of criminals with dogs. The prison here depicts a pack of wild dogs (the long-timers and hardened criminals) into which the poor little chihuahua (first offender) has been cast. The only thing he has to protect himself against the pack are his shrill and frightened words.
koohiiStory1: The wild dog family visits their cousin in prison. They exchange words over the interphone at the visiting booth.
koohiiStory2: The only thing keeping the new chihuahua inmate from being ´initiated´ by the pack of wild dogs were his quick words in prison.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have an animal and you say it’s a dog to prevent it from going to prison. Dogs are the only animals that don’t have to go to prison. Your animal is not a dog, but you say it is to prevent it from going to prison.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine any animal that’s not a dog. Now imagine dressing it up like a dog so it doesn’t have to go to prison. Practice throwing your voice by saying “woof woof” aloud to help convince people that your animal is actually a dog.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What is the name of your animal? Your animal is named Goku (ごく). Yeah, like Goku from Dragon Ball Z. You don’t want your little Goku to go to prison, so you say that he’s a dog.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Poor little Goku doesn’t want to go to prison either so Goku does his best to act like a dog even though he isn’t. How adorable.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the left dog (犭) and the right dog (犬) keep the words (言) in prison
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Prison is made up of the hardened wild dogs (prisoners) and frightened chihuahua's (the guards). Here they are having a word with each other.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscriptions from the " words " from the two " dogs ", "㹜" is like two dogs facing each other and attacking each other. The whole character will argue with words (Yang Shuda, Dai Jiaxiang). The original meaning is prison litigation. The structure of the small seal is the same as that of the bronze inscription, "Shuowen": "Prison, indeed. Cong 㹜 Cong Yan. Two dogs, so Shou Ye." According to " Suo Wen", " Yan " from the sound of "䇂", "䇂" refers to the criminal, Therefore Xu Shen mistakenly thought that " prison " was to guard the criminal with two dogs to prevent him from escaping. In ancient Chinese, " yan " does not follow "䇂", so Xu Shen's explanation is not accurate (Yang Shuda).

Bronze " prison " is used as the original meaning, referring to litigation, six years of calling Baihu (that is, 琱生𣪕): "Gonglu (jue) pays shells, use prison 𧧒 (thorn) as Bai (bo)", which means that the public has paid The shell currency was used as a lawsuit against his uncle in prison. It also extended the meaning of punishment and prison, and collapsed: "Don't use (bring) tyranny from (longitudinal) prison", that is, don't abuse prison.

The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period and Qin Slips were also used as the original meaning, referring to prison lawsuits. "Rong Chengshi" Jan 29: "The blame (Gao) Tao has been ordered to distinguish the Qi of Qi (yin) and Min (yang), and Sheng (listen to) his lawsuit", referring to Gao Tao's appointment, so he first distinguished The yin and yang will come to know the good and bad, and then listen to the second lawsuit (Ji Xusheng). Also "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Law Questions and Answers" Jan. 107: "Baozi and above, if you die without being in prison, if you have been buried, but if you are told by (Fu), you should not be treated, and you should not accept it. It is like a family crime." Only those who have died or have been buried in prison will be charged, and should not be accepted. Without arrest, the same applies to family crimes.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from " yan " to " dogs ", "㹜" is like two dogs facing each other and attacking each other. The whole character will argue with words (Yang Shuda, Dai Jiaxiang). The original meaning is prison litigation.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「言」從二「犬」，「㹜」象兩犬相向，互相攻擊。全字會以言語相爭訟之義(楊樹達、戴家祥)。本義是獄訟。小篆形構與金文同，《說文》：「獄，确也。从㹜从言。二犬，所以守也。」按《說文》以「言」從「䇂」聲，「䇂」指罪犯，因此許慎誤以為「獄」乃以二犬守住罪犯，以防止他逃走。古文字中「言」並不從「䇂」，因此許慎說解並不準確(楊樹達)。

　　金文「獄」用作本義，指訴訟，六年召白虎𣪕(即琱生𣪕)：「公氒(厥)稟貝，用獄𧧒(刺)為白(伯)」，指公已經繳納了貝幣，作為與伯父獄訟之用。又引申有刑獄之義，坍盨：「勿吏(使)暴虐從(縱)獄」，即不要濫施刑獄。

　　戰國竹簡、秦簡亦用作本義，指獄訟，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡29：「咎(臯)陶既已受命，乃辨侌(陰)昜(陽)之氣，而聖(聽)其訟獄」，指臯陶接受任命以後，於是先分辨陰陽之氣來知道吉凶，再傾聽二造的訟辭(季旭昇)。又《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡107：「葆子以上，未獄而死若已葬，而誧(甫)告之，亦不當聽治，勿收，皆如家罪。」全句指葆子以上有未得獄訟審判而死或已埋葬的，才有人控告，也不應受理，不加拘捕，都和家罪同例。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「言」從二「犬」，「㹜」象兩犬相向，互相攻擊。全字會以言語相爭訟之義(楊樹達、戴家祥)。本義是獄訟。

金文從「 言 」從二「 犬 」，「 㹜 」象兩犬相向，互相攻擊。全字會以言語相爭訟之義(楊樹達、戴家祥)。本義是獄訟。小篆形構與金文同，《說文》：「獄，确也。从㹜从言。二犬，所以守也。」按《說文》以「 言 」從「 䇂 」聲，「 䇂 」指罪犯，因此許慎誤以為「 獄 」乃以二犬守住罪犯，以防止他逃走。古文字中「 言 」並不從「 䇂 」，因此許慎說解並不準確(楊樹達)。 金文「 獄 」用作本義，指訴訟，六年召白虎𣪕(即琱生𣪕)：「公氒(厥)稟貝，用獄𧧒(刺)為白(伯)」，指公已經繳納了貝幣，作為與伯父獄訟之用。又引申有刑獄之義，坍盨：「勿吏(使)暴虐從(縱)獄」，即不要濫施刑獄。 戰國竹簡、秦簡亦用作本義，指獄訟，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡29：「咎(臯)陶既已受命，乃辨侌(陰)昜(陽)之氣，而聖(聽)其訟獄」，指臯陶接受任命以後，於是先分辨陰陽之氣來知道吉凶，再傾聽二造的訟辭(季旭昇)。又《睡虎地秦簡．法律答問》簡107：「葆子以上，未獄而死若已葬，而誧(甫)告之，亦不當聽治，勿收，皆如家罪。」全句指葆子以上有未得獄訟審判而死或已埋葬的，才有人控告，也不應受理，不加拘捕，都和家罪同例。
Elaboration: The inscriptions from the " words" from the two " dogs", " 㹜" is like two dogs facing each other and attacking each other. The whole character will argue with words (Yang Shuda, Dai Jiaxiang). The original meaning is prison litigation. The structure of the small seal is the same as that of the bronze inscription, "Shuowen": "Prison, indeed. Cong 㹜 Cong Yan. Two dogs, so Shou Ye." According to " Suo Wen", " Yan" from the sound of " 䇂", " 䇂" refers to the criminal, Therefore Xu Shen mistakenly thought that " prison" was to guard the criminal with two dogs to prevent him from escaping. In ancient Chinese, " yan" does not follow" 䇂", so Xu Shen's explanation is not accurate (Yang Shuda). Bronze " prison" is used as the original meaning, referring to litigation, six years of calling Baihu (that is, 琱生𣪕): "Gonglu (jue) pays shells, use prison 𧧒 (thorn) as Bai (bo)", which means that the public has paid The shell currency was used as a lawsuit against his uncle in prison. It also extended the meaning of punishment and prison, and collapsed: "Don't use (bring) tyranny from (longitudinal) prison", that is, don't abuse prison. The Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period and Qin Slips were also used as the original meaning, referring to prison lawsuits. "Rong Chengshi" Jan 29: "The blame (Gao) Tao has been ordered to distinguish the Qi of Qi (yin) and Min (yang), and Sheng (listen to) his lawsuit", referring to Gao Tao's appointment, so he first distinguished The yin and yang will come to know the good and bad, and then listen to the second lawsuit (Ji Xusheng). Also "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Law Questions and Answers" Jan. 107: "Baozi and above, if you die without being in prison, if you have been buried, but if you are told by (Fu), you should not be treated, and you should not accept it. It is like a family crime." Only those who have died or have been buried in prison will be charged, and should not be accepted. Without arrest, the same applies to family crimes.

獄字的基本解释

獄
yù
见“狱”。

獄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》魚欲切，入燭，疑。］
“狱1”的繁体字。
(1)争讼。
(2)引申为争论。
(3)讼案。
(4)指案卷。
(5)刑狱。
(6)指刑罚。
(7)监狱。
(8)罪；罪案。

獄字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页717第03
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】魚欲切【集韻】【韻會】虞欲切，?音玉。【說文】确也。从㹜从言。二犬，所以守也。【釋名】獄，确也。确實人之情僞也。【玉篇】二王始有獄。殷曰羑里，周曰囹圄。又謂之牢，又謂之圜土。【廣韻】臯陶所造。【易·賁卦】象曰：山下有火賁，君子以明庶政，无敢折獄。【書·立政】文王罔攸，兼于庶言，庶獄，庶愼。【詩·召南】誰謂女無家，何以速我獄。　又星名。【史記·天官書】獄漢星出正北，北方之野。星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，察之中靑。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　Prison; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 717 No. 03
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Fish wants to cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Yu wants to cut,? Yin Yu. [Said the text] indeed. Cong 㹜 Cong Yan. Two dogs, so Shouya. [Release name] Prison, indeed. Human sentiment is indeed hypocritical. [Jade articles] The two kings began to have prison. Yin said Yili, Zhou said Jiaowei. It is also called the prison, and it is also called the 圜土. [Guang Yun] Made by Gao Tao. [Easy·Ben Hexagram] Xiang said: There is a fire ben under the mountain, and a gentleman knows his government, and he has no daring to break into prison. 【Book·Leading politics】Wang Wangyou, who is also in the public language, prison, and concubine. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Who means that a woman has no home? How can I speed up my prison.　Also star name. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】The prisoner star is out of the true north, the wild north. The stars can go to the ground at six feet, big and red, moving several times, and observing the middle.

yù
вм. 狱
Radicals: 犭, 言, 犬  (animal, say, dog)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have an animal and you say it’s a dog to prevent it from going to prison. Dogs are the only animals that don’t have to go to prison. Your animal is not a dog, but you say it is to prevent it from going to prison.
Imagine any animal that’s not a dog. Now imagine dressing it up like a dog so it doesn’t have to go to prison. Practice throwing your voice by saying “woof woof” aloud to help convince people that your animal is actually a dog.
Reading Mnemonic
What is the name of your animal? Your animal is named Goku (ごく). Yeah, like Goku from Dragon Ball Z. You don’t want your little Goku to go to prison, so you say that he’s a dog.
Poor little Goku doesn’t want to go to prison either so Goku does his best to act like a dog even though he isn’t. How adorable.

犯 (преступник), 犬 (собака), 言 (слово)
